DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesise that the use of Adelmidrol (Saginil in vaginal cannulas) can reduce the incidence and magnitude of vaginitis in patients affected by gynecologic malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: Saginil in vs. Placebo for Gynecologic Oncology Patients Affected by Vaginitis
DOC.criteria: Gynecologic malignancy Current administration of chemotherapy Colpectomy Vaginal cancer Vulvar cancer Bacterial vaginitis
